note_text: Patient reported mild dizziness, recommended checking blood pressure regularly. Discussed potential medication adjustments.

Seasonal allergy symptoms are moderate. Considering referral to ENT if symptoms worsen.
Patient's iron levels still borderline low, recommended continuing supplements.
Diabetes management: A1C results improved slightly, but patient should monitor sugar intake.
Routine pediatric checkup recommended. No specific concerns noted at this time.
Patient's cholesterol levels remain high, reinforcing dietary changes and medication adherence.
Asthma is controlled, but patient experiences shortness of breath during high pollen count. Possibly adjust inhaler dosage.
Migraines increasing in frequency. Recommended an MRI if no improvement after next medication trial.
